tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_audience VARCHAR(255),
    email_subject VARCHAR(255),
    email_content TEXT,
    open_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    click_through_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_recipients INT,
    total_clicks INT
);

CREATE TABLE email_recipients (
    recipient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipient_name VARCHAR(255),
    email_address VARCHAR(255),
    subscription_status BOOLEAN,
    last_opened_date DATE,
    last_clicked_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Emails (
    email_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    recipient_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    sent_date DATE,
    open_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_audience VARCHAR(255),
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Clicks (
    click_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    email_id INT NOT NULL,
    click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    product_clicked VARCHAR(255),
    purchased BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE EmailSubscribers (
    subscriber_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    subscription_date DATE,
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignSubscribers (
    campaign_id INT,
    subscriber_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (campaign_id, subscriber_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES EmailSubscribers(subscriber_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EmailMessages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    subject VARCHAR(255),
    body TEXT,
    send_date DATETIME,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Clicks (
    click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    subscriber_id INT,
    message_id INT,
    click_date DATETIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES EmailSubscribers(subscriber_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES EmailMessages(message_id)
);
